text:
Write down names of 50 to 100 people who you know can afford any of our sets
get the following information from them and let me know:-
Full names
Post address
Telephone number
Email address
And how many people living in their homes
I will send you the prices and the commission chart to you send me your daughterâ€™s name and phone number too to me. Looking forward to hearing from you.
Stay safe and blessedâ¤ï¸ğŸŒ¹ğŸ‘ŒğŸ¾
